oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assortment of minie balls, buttons, buckle and breastplate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Assortment of Civil War era artifacts, including 5 minie balls, 4 buttons, one buckle cover for harness and one breastplate. Three of the buttons have an "I" in the shield, which indicates an infantry officer. The second bullet from the left is a Sharp's carbine bullet. The fourth from the left is a Smith carbine bullet, and the last one is a Pritchett bullet manufactured in England and imported by both sides during the war.
